data.title: EMC Centera® Compliance Edition Plus
data.text:
EMC Centera® Compliance Edition Plus enables you to meet strict requirements for electronic data storage—it is designed for the most stringent of regulated business environments. EMC Centera® Compliance Edition Plus captures and preserves original content and ensures complete, reliable integrity for the life of your archived information.

EMC Centera® enforces organizational and application policies for information retention and disposition intrinsic in storage—and by doing so completes the information chain of custody. It ensures corporate accountability and reduces the costs of legal discovery and litigation support—and it’s easy to manage.

Features:
